content.raw:
We have tried running the new ignition-based subt simulator on a few different machines, and we are having several issues getting it working.  

I am able to compile everything after following the instructions on the Catkin system installation tutorial (#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall). 

However, when I run the command 'ign launch virtual_stix.ign -v 4', I get errors like the following:

ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_bridge/parameter_bridge]: ros1_ign_bridge
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/subt-neil/ign_subt_ws/install/share
ROS path [2]=/opt/ros/melodic/share

The gazebo window does eventually pop up, however.  I am attaching everything that prints to the console (see gazebo_run1_errors.log).  

Then, when I try to run the team.ign file in the Example Setup tutorial (#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup), I see the vehicles get spawned, but I can't connect to them, and the console indicates that things haven't connected properly, so it shuts down the monitor node.  The attachment also contains console outputs for the new messages in the gazebo window (upon launching team.ign) as well as the output in the team.ign window itself.  

I am attempting to run the new ignition stuff on the same computer on which I have been running the gazebo9 version.  I don't want to lose what I have that's already working.  Thanks!
content.html:
We have tried running the new ignition-based subt simulator on a few different machines, and we are having several issues getting it working.

I am able to compile everything after following the instructions on the Catkin system installation tutorial (#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall).

However, when I run the command 'ign launch virtual_stix.ign -v 4', I get errors like the following:

ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_bridge/parameter_bridge]: ros1_ign_bridge ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros ROS path [1]=/home/subt-neil/ign_subt_ws/install/share ROS path [2]=/opt/ros/melodic/share

The gazebo window does eventually pop up, however. I am attaching everything that prints to the console (see gazebo_run1_errors.log).

Then, when I try to run the team.ign file in the Example Setup tutorial (#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup), I see the vehicles get spawned, but I can't connect to them, and the console indicates that things haven't connected properly, so it shuts down the monitor node. The attachment also contains console outputs for the new messages in the gazebo window (upon launching team.ign) as well as the output in the team.ign window itself.

I am attempting to run the new ignition stuff on the same computer on which I have been running the gazebo9 version. I don't want to lose what I have that's already working. Thanks!
